Contest responses to Lenore Skenazy's "Only in New York" and "New York Stories" columns, New York Daily News

Tear sheets and photocopies of published "New York Stories" contests (scattered)
Tear sheets and photocopies of published "New York Stories" contests (scattered)

• NYS Contest 19. The least relaxing vacation you ever endured! [results published March 22, 1992] • NYS Contest 25. Proof that your pet is a genius (or at least pretty darn clever). [results published May 3, 1992] • NYS Contest 27. What's the silliest thing you ever said in another language—accidentally, of course? [results published May 17, 1992] • NYS Contest 34. What's the strangest thing you ever witnessed at one of New York's parks or beaches? [results published July 5, 1992] • NYS Contest 37. What character did you play in make-believe? And what was the basic scenario? [results published July 26, 1992] • NYS Contest 38. What's the wildest thing you ever did when you came face to face with a celebrity? [results published August 2, 1992]
